ROM.Changelog:
# AIMROM V2.5 UPDATE!
-Merge August security patch -Add support for Snapdragon LLVM toolchain (SDClang) -Add support for boost framework -Add support for fling velocities -Added Colorengine -Added Xosp Blur personalization -Added AOKP Transition animations -Added New battery style -Enable/Disable kill button on notification guts -Fix string derps -Fix In-Call vibrations -Animate icon while locking a task -Fix Lockscreen shortcut icons disappearing after reboot -Make button long press delay configurable in SmartBar -Fix layout of system header -Fix task lock and free form button placement -Fix Dex2oat -Fix In-Call timer bug -Fixed a npe -Fix theme issues in screen pinning mode -Disable home button wake on devices with sensitive HW buttons -Add check for accidental touch -Add pocket lock and pocket judge -Doze Service: Fallback to tilt sensor as pickup sensor for ambient display -Fix many memory leaks -Option to block sensor for certain packages -Fix few NPEs -Increase sensitive numbers support -Update all translations -Update all pre-built packages -Performance enhancements and bug fixes
#Let's AIM-ify --- # Note : _Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without Logcat. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._ ---
